text: Daniel Buckley (born 1945) is an Irish retired hurler who played for Cork Championship club Blackrock. He played for the Cork senior hurling team for two seasons, during which time he usually lined out as a left corner-forward. ==Honours== ;Blackrock *All-Ireland Senior Club Hurling Championship (1): 1979 *Munster Senior Club Hurling Championship (2): 1978, 1979 *Cork Senior Hurling Championship (3): 1978, 1979, 1985 ;Cork *Munster Senior Hurling Championship (1): 1979 *National Hurling League (1): 1979-80 *All-Ireland Under-21 Hurling Championship (1): 1976 *Munster Under-21 Hurling Championship (1): 1975, 1976, 1977 *All-Ireland Minor Hurling Championship (1): 1974 *Munster Minor Hurling Championship (2): 1974, 1975 ==References== Category:1957 births Category:Living people Category:Blackrock hurlers Category:Cork inter-county hurlers Category:Hurling forwards
title: Danny Buckley
